original: @469a / /'jam dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa /
analyzed: @469a / /'jam dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa /

original: gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po //
analyzed: gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po //

original: ye shes sgron mes rab brgyan zhing //
analyzed: ye shes sgron mes rab brgyan zhing //

original: 'jig rten gti mug mun sel ba //
analyzed: 'jig rten gti mug mun sel ba //

original: nyid kyi mdangs bzang tshogs kyis ni //

translated: With the radiance of your excellent body,

original: zla ba rgyas ba zil gnon zhing //
analyzed: zla ba rgyas ba zil gnon zhing //
translated: Surpassing the full moon,

original: ma rig rnam par bsal gyur pa //
analyzed: ma rig rnam par bsal gyur pa //
translated: Dispelling ignorance,

original: 'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //

translated: In the unmade topknot,游댷With a blazing jewel body,

original: nyid ni kun tu dga' ba'i sku //
analyzed: nyid ni kun tu dga' ba'i sku //

original: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: bdud rtsi 'dra zhing 'jam la zab; ;yid 'ong gsung gi sgra sgrogs pa //

original: dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen mdzod //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen mdzod //
translated: A treasure of the sublime Dharma,

original: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //

analyzed: gang+g'a'i chu thigs ltar grangs med //
translated: As numerous as the drops in the Ganges,

original: 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par //

original: nyon mongs dri ma ma lus pa //
analyzed: nyon mongs dri ma ma lus pa //

analyzed: 'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni //
translated: With a terrifying form, baring fangs and grimacing,

original: gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa //

original: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Ma침ju콑r캶, I pay homage and praise you.

original: rang gi spyan dang mdangs 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: rang gi spyan dang mdangs 'dra ba'i //
translated: With eyes and radiance similar to your own,

original: autpal sngon pos rab mdzas pa //
analyzed: autpal sngon pos rab mdzas pa //

original: lhung bzed phyag na bsnams pa yi //
analyzed: lhung bzed phyag na bsnams pa yi //

analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la //

analyzed: rgya cher mchod dang bstod pa yis //
translated: To the buddhas dwelling in the ten directions,

original: grol ba'i lam ni ston pa po //
analyzed: grol ba'i lam ni ston pa po //

original: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa rdzogs so //
